input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item specifications and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
East Carolina Pirates Men's Executive Watch

Item specifications:
Links Make Watch Adjustable
Stainless Steel
Men
23kt Gold-Plated Bezel
Officially Licensed East Carolina Pirates Men's Two Tone Gold Dress Watch
input_text.Response A: This elegant East Carolina Pirates Men's Executive Watch is made of stainless steel with a 23kt gold-plated bezel.  The watch has a two-tone gold design with a black dial.  The watch is very stylish and would make a great gift for any fan.  It is officially licensed by the NCAA and features the East Carolina Pirates logo on the watch face.  The watch links are adjustable so it will fit most wrist sizes.  It is a great looking watch that is sure to please any fan.
input_text.Response B: This stylish leather collar is perfect for your tiny pup. It's adorned with a pewter skull charm for a chic and fashionable finishing touch. The collar is available in purple color and measures 6-10-inch length by 3/8-inch width. This collar is designed for teacup and small dog breeds only.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
